positive.review:
I love idle games, this has to be my fav.
The best part i think is that u can prove u didn't buy any souls and that every new mechanic is wonderfully developed and easily mastered.
Love this shit, Havn't stopped logging in daily since i found it.

Took me that long to complete it, honestly as idle games go, it's got charm think the only thing is after a small bit it just becomes a lets log in and wait until it gets the achivements which is what happened with this one.
Still a good free one as all things considerd
Fun little idle game about killing potatoes, it's got trees, it's got skills, it's got things you click, it's got levels, it's got all the things. It's overwhelmingly positive for a reason.
Tickles my tism, its a fun idle game, takes a long time but its worth it as a passivwe game.
very addictive idle game, lots of mechanics and different things to do.
Not the best idle game I've ever played, but it has lots of content and is pretty fun. There's supposed to be a new update coming and I'll return once that comes along.
Love this game . Spent so many hours killing those dam spuds and setting up my farmer. lots of fun with all the in and outs of this game.

Not bad.... i fight potatoes so i can find worms and breed them to collect their sh*t to get stronger and after i can trade 100 worms to get 1 cow. And NO i dont collect cow sht just worms, no idea why . 

I do recommend for EVERYBODY to try this farming game for good people that love to collect worms p00oo0p
Great game so far. Monetization is very fair. Lots of variety and content to keep you going. reccomend over a lot of other Idle games i have played
A humorous and well-crafted idle game where you manage a farm besieged by rebellious potatoes. Automate your defenses, unlock new technologies, and reclaim your land.

Игра 'Farmer Against Potatoes Idle' – это залипательный idle-кликер с простым, но увлекательным геймплеем. Смысл в том, чтобы постоянно улучшать свою ферму и защищаться от полчищ атакующих картофелин. Сначала все медленно, но постепенно появляются новые виды оружия, помощники и улучшения, что добавляет мотивации.

Графика простая, но приятная и ненавязчивая. Юмор легкий и своеобразный, что тоже радует. Система престижа позволяет каждый раз начинать с небольшим бустом, чтобы быстрее продвигаться дальше.

Что мне особенно понравилось, так это разнообразие контента. Всегда есть куда стремиться: новые типы картофелин, которых нужно победить, новые апгрейды для фермы, новые помощники, которых можно нанять. Это держит в напряжении и не дает заскучать.

Иногда гринд может показаться немного утомительным, но возможность оставить игру включенной в фоновом режиме частично решает эту проблему. В целом, это отличный тайм-киллер, который хорошо подходит для коротких сессий или просто для того, чтобы занять себя, пока делаешь что-то другое. Рекомендую!

Absolutely love this small clicker game. I find the mission really intriguing and fun to play. Anyone who is bored and wants to play something free, for a long or short period of time, this is the game.
fun idler with consistent systems to keep growth and entertainment
pretty straight forward every time you feel like progress is hitting a wall new options for progress open up and its simple great stuff
I'm still at the starting levels but what I've seen so far has kept me checking in regularly to keep my progress up-to-date with my idle earnings.
Its fun and has so much content!

THE GAME MADE ME DO IT!

j/k - but this game is pretty good. Progress is what you make of it, and is a fairly polished product with indications that more is coming.
the goat idle game. cookie clicker and clicker heroes walked so this could run.
Excellent idle game with both addictive features and doses of humour.
This game is fun to play. Always something new as your progress. Great time waster.
fun game (long game) lots to do would recommend
Free and reasonably fun.
potato good 11/10
Having fun, good idle game so far!
its fun and grindyyyyyyyyyyyyy hellla grindyyyyyyyyyy
a nice and relaxing game
Relax and collect potatoes
honestly top tier idle game
as an idle game liker this one's pretty good
very fun idle game
Good idler so far!
Good game
Eat Potato! You Potatoes
Great idle game.
potatos so good
Good idle game
gud game
Good idle game
Idle game...
scratches my idle itch
I really enjoy the game
Fun idle
Some good stuffs
good progression
potatoes gonna potate
I LOVE POTATOES
my favorite idle i think

I love idle games, this has to be my fav.
The best part i think is that u can prove u didn't buy any souls and that every new mechanic is wonderfully developed and easily mastered.
Love this shit, Havn't stopped logging in daily since i found it.
Nice and very complex game! Ample content on many layers but the most positive thing is that it is NOT pay to win!

Took me that long to complete it, honestly as idle games go, it's got charm think the only thing is after a small bit it just becomes a lets log in and wait until it gets the achivements which is what happened with this one.
Still a good free one as all things considerd
Fun little idle game about killing potatoes, it's got trees, it's got skills, it's got things you click, it's got levels, it's got all the things. It's overwhelmingly positive for a reason.

This is the Idle game that has kept my interest, if you like Idle games, this one to me has been the most engaging without feeling overwhelming with the amount of systems implemented. there is always something to progress within it's varying systems
If you liked Revolution Idle, you're gonna like this. Progression is linear for the most part. Nothing all that repetitive in the gameplay loop. Solid idle game that isn't finished in 5 hours.
Tickles my tism, its a fun idle game, takes a long time but its worth it as a passivwe game.

I have reincarnated 400 times in order to kill one hundred million potatoes.

I have a pet dragon that dramatically increases the amount my worms poop.

10/10 would ascend again.
very addictive idle game, lots of mechanics and different things to do.
Not the best idle game I've ever played, but it has lots of content and is pretty fun. There's supposed to be a new update coming and I'll return once that comes along.
Love this game . Spent so many hours killing those dam spuds and setting up my farmer. lots of fun with all the in and outs of this game.

Not bad.... i fight potatoes so i can find worms and breed them to collect their sh*t to get stronger and after i can trade 100 worms to get 1 cow. And NO i dont collect cow sht just worms, no idea why . 

I do recommend for EVERYBODY to try this farming game for good people that love to collect worms p00oo0p
Great game so far. Monetization is very fair. Lots of variety and content to keep you going. reccomend over a lot of other Idle games i have played

So far I'm at 130 hours play time and I haven't even scratched the surface of this game! If you like idle optimization games, this one is definitely top tier. It's not very pay-to-win as far as free ones go either — you can collect all of the store perks pretty easily over a reasonable time period by just playing the game and doing daily quests, so you mostly end up paying for character skins if you want them. There are also daily discounts on random store perks to make it easier to snatch them all up as a free to play player. I haven't gotten to interact with the seasonal much, but that seems like a really cool way to have an in-game competition between players with great rewards even for just participating. Overall, definitely recommend this game to anyone who enjoys the genre, especially if you're operating on a budget.
So far I found everything I need in an Idler. Balanced, didn't hit a major wall yet. Keeps me interested by introducing new mechanics at the right time.

Played a lot of Idle games....a lot...and for many hours, So far, 49 hours in, this is one of the best. The progression feels super nice, you never feel like your stuck, everything can be earned in game, and all the systems feel like they are adding something and not just there to pad.   Great job Dev, two thumbs way way up!

favorite idle game, im picky about them and this has enough involvement and engaging prestiges that is hard to find not to mention the gear system rocks you can really beef up with a gear push which is also rare without spending dozens of dollars per day....highly recommend and also to take ur time to learn each system!

Ever wondered what happens when potatoes revolt? Meet the amnesic Farmer—your one-man army against the mutated tuber uprising. With over 9000 waves across multiple worlds, millions of possible equipment combos, and a talent tree bigger than your grocery list, this game turns idle farming into epic potato-slaying chaos. Upgrade, reincarnate, and experiment with classes to keep those spud invaders in check… and maybe finally remember who you are.

It's a surprisingly engaging idle game. The progression feels rewarding, and the art style is charming. Managing resources and upgrading your defenses keeps you hooked. A fun little time-waster that doesn't demand too much attention.

For a free game, this game has so many layers to it. It's one of the only idle games that I haven't maxed out yet and I've been playing for 150+ hours and don't plan to stop any time soon. It's great!

The concept of a farmer battling mutant potatoes is delightfully absurd—in the best way. It gave me nostalgic vibes of Attack of the Killer Tomatoes from the '80s, which made the experience even more enjoyable.
As an idle game, it delivers well. Progress feels satisfying, and best of all, microtransactions aren’t necessary to enjoy the full experience. You can play at your own pace without feeling pressured to spend.
Kudos to Oni Gaming:
Great job to the devs for crafting something quirky, fun, and refreshingly fair. Looking forward to what you cook up next!
Best Idler I have played. (still good but bring out another multiplayer season)

This is an awesome idle game. Kill potatoes, get good gear, repeat. Lots of unlocks (I haven't unlocked all of the game menus yet) and lots of things to keep you "active" in this idle game. Highly recommend!
Pretty good and a plus is all the additional mechanics

This one held my attention more than most...

But once I unlocked the final area and so very little changed... I decided I was done.
A humorous and well-crafted idle game where you manage a farm besieged by rebellious potatoes. Automate your defenses, unlock new technologies, and reclaim your land.

Игра 'Farmer Against Potatoes Idle' – это залипательный idle-кликер с простым, но увлекательным геймплеем. Что мне особенно понравилось, так это разнообразие контента. Всегда есть куда стремиться: новые типы картофелин, которых нужно победить, новые апгрейды для фермы, новые помощники, которых можно нанять. Это держит в напряжении и не дает заскучать.

Иногда гринд может показаться немного утомительным, но возможность оставить игру включенной в фоновом режиме частично решает эту проблему. В целом, это отличный тайм-киллер, который хорошо подходит для коротких сессий или просто для того, чтобы занять себя, пока делаешь что-то другое. Рекомендую!

I downloaded a bunch of idle games one day out of boredom, and while this was one of those I expected the least from because of the boring, generic name, it turned out to be one of the most well paced and feature complete idle game I've ever played.

Just a couple words of caution : 
1) don't play for leaderboards, there's no catching up people that started day 1 even if you enable all the p2w boosters (those can be earned for free, but you'll never have everything without paying - unless you really stall your progress, which isn't not worth it)
2) It's made on unity, meaning like too many other games (ie caves of qud) it kinda runs like garbage because it wastes so much processing power calculating useless things. Loading a mid-game to endgame file (A16) took minutes every now and then. I know some ingame currencies evolve at A30 and A40 - and I suspect that's at least partially tied to this. I often left the game on running overnight and more often than not woke up to the game being frozen & crashed.
3) It's REALLY easy to corrupt your file - so unlike me, make an account to have your backups. My save was stuck on loading for hours so probably was fucked - and trying to get back to where I was with a new file and a bit of cheatengine broke it again, so I just took a look at the last tab I hadn't unlocked cheating some more, and now I'm bitterly droping it earlier than I wanted to. (afaik dev tries to help with that, but given I did cheat their microtransactions prior to my first save breaking, I wasn't gonna waste their time)

TLDR : Worth playing if you like idle games, but don't try to fiddle with it or run it for too long + make backups.
Fun in general, no criticisms once I got used to it

Absolutely love this small clicker game. I find the mission really intriguing and fun to play. Anyone who is bored and wants to play something free, for a long or short period of time, this is the game.
fun idler with consistent systems to keep growth and entertainment
pretty straight forward every time you feel like progress is hitting a wall new options for progress open up and its simple great stuff

This is much interesting than Revolution Idle.

I personally not a big fan of soft reset multiple mechanics in order to get bigger number, but this is an alternative to consider if you want to take a break from idleon. There are some "min-max" routes to go especially when you hit Infinity Chamber and Ascension, but otherwise it is enjoyable than simply waiting from soft-capped numbers.

The handmade arts also look very epic!

Dear Diary, 

  The days are starting to blend together....the potatoes never tire of their ceaseless assault. Idaho was the first to go. These root-ruffians are relentless. I have lost count of how many times I've died and resurrected...to continue this never-ending siege on starch. There were hopes of a nutritional negotiation, but these pugnacious potatoes do not want peace. 
  I have lingered too long, and must return to the fight. 

Mom if you're reading this we need more ketchup.
Kill potatoes to get potatoes to kill more potatoes. Number goes up. Good game
I killed potatoes, I'll probably kill some more. Play it if you like idle games like Unnamed Space Idle or NGU idle. Or don't I'm not your dad
I'm still at the starting levels but what I've seen so far has kept me checking in regularly to keep my progress up-to-date with my idle earnings.
Good idle game with lots of numbers going up.
fun cool casual game farmer style
Its fun and has so much content!
NGU idle will forever be my love, but this actually comes close

THE GAME MADE ME DO IT!

j/k - but this game is pretty good. Progress is what you make of it, and is a fairly polished product with indications that more is coming.
the goat idle game. cookie clicker and clicker heroes walked so this could run.
Excellent idle game with both addictive features and doses of humour.
This game is fun to play. Always something new as your progress. Great time waster.
its an idle game, you know what you're signing up for
fun game (long game) lots to do would recommend

negative.review: really cool game, gets repetitive pretty quick
kinda boring ngl

If you have OCD or anxiety, it will feel like it is taking your attention away from your "mind demons". But it's a trap, a well conceived trap, to keep you in a state of distraction while managing hundred of meaningless details in a video game. You will still feel empty inside. You will feel starved of accomplishments while playing this, fully knowing that this time is forever lost and you achieve nothing. And at some point, at ascension or reincarnation, or any reset, the feeling of emptiness will grow, because you are not taking care of yourself and instead fall for idle games (which are not games but a trap to tap into your feeble mind). This is exploiting your weaknesses.

Now that I feel better, I realised this game in fact did NOT help me, nor any moment passed "playing" it was entertaining and satisfying. IT WAS NOT.

Fun is elsewhere. Help is also elsewhere.
The artwork is pretty bad, there are big walls through the game. A lot of time it is very unclear what you are supposed to do or even CAN do.

Store purchases don't link to in-game.

Game has good features, no crashes, easy to pick up and plenty of mechanics. Just can't sell people stuff you don't deliver and then not respond to a ticket for 3 days.  I'm fine with spending $5 just to play the game, good value for 30 hours, but this is just to warn others that spending money doesn't mean you'll get what you paid for in the shop.
The mechanics are confusing, and not clear how they are connected overall. Just not a fun idler (not that idlers are fun, but this one is definitely on the less fun side)
really cool game, gets repetitive pretty quick
Stunlocked me for an hour before i realised I'm not actually having fun
Poor browser graphics.
It's very boring but it's free.
kinda boring ngl

If you have OCD or anxiety, it will feel like it is taking your attention away from your "mind demons". But it's a trap, a well conceived trap, to keep you in a state of distraction while managing hundred of meaningless details in a video game. You will still feel empty inside. You will feel starved of accomplishments while playing this, fully knowing that this time is forever lost and you achieve nothing. And at some point, at ascension or reincarnation, or any reset, the feeling of emptiness will grow, because you are not taking care of yourself and instead fall for idle games (which are not games but a trap to tap into your feeble mind). This is exploiting your weaknesses.

Now that I feel better, I realised this game in fact did NOT help me, nor any moment passed "playing" it was entertaining and satisfying. IT WAS NOT.

Fun is elsewhere. Help is also elsewhere.
The artwork is pretty bad, there are big walls through the game. A lot of time it is very unclear what you are supposed to do or even CAN do.

Store purchases don't link to in-game.

Game has good features, no crashes, easy to pick up and plenty of mechanics. Just can't sell people stuff you don't deliver and then not respond to a ticket for 3 days.  I'm fine with spending $5 just to play the game, good value for 30 hours, but this is just to warn others that spending money doesn't mean you'll get what you paid for in the shop.
The mechanics are confusing, and not clear how they are connected overall. Just not a fun idler (not that idlers are fun, but this one is definitely on the less fun side)
really cool game, gets repetitive pretty quick
Stunlocked me for an hour before i realised I'm not actually having fun
